      • decodeSlashes

        protected java.lang.String decodeSlashes(java.lang.String uriPathComponent)
        Some web servers have issues dealing with encoded slashes (%2F) in URLs. This method enables the use of an alternate string to represent a slash via SLASH_SUBSTITUTE_CONFIG_KEY.
        Parameters:
        uriPathComponent -
        Returns:
